    • validateTime

      public boolean validateTime()
      Validates the logic of the selected start and end times Validates against business hours
      Returns:
      false if there are errors

    • validateInputFields

      public boolean validateInputFields()
      Validates the form entries are complete and selections have been made on the comboBoxes
      Returns:
      false if incomplete

    • saveAppointment

      public void saveAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      Creates an Appointment instance after validation. Validates form input fields are complete and time logic is without error. Also validates the time is within business hours and does not overlap with the customer's other appointments
      Parameters:
      event - when the save button is fired
      Throws:
      IOException - if I/O operation fails
      SQLException - JDBC encountered an error with the data source

    • convertZDT

      public Timestamp convertZDT​(ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Sets the ZonedDateTime reference to UTC and then converts the object to a Timestamp
      Parameters:
      zdt - the ZonedDateTime reference
      Returns:
      the timestamp

    • convertToTimeObject

      public LocalDateTime convertToTimeObject​(LocalTime tm)
      Takes the selected date, hour, and minute and creates a LocalDateTime object
      Parameters:
      tm - the time
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime object of the input time

    • convertToSystemZonedDateTime

      public ZonedDateTime convertToSystemZonedDateTime​(LocalDateTime ldt)
      Converts a LocalDateTime object to a ZonedDateTime object
      Parameters:
      ldt - an instance of LocalDateTime
      Returns:
      ZonedDateTime relative to the user's system time

    • validateZonedDateTimeBusiness

      public boolean validateZonedDateTimeBusiness​(ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Validates the selected time against the business hours
      Parameters:
      zdt - an instance of the ZonedDateTime object
      Returns:
      true if the selected time is within business hours

    • validateOverlap

      public boolean validateOverlap​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> customerAppts)
      Looks for any overlaps between the input list of appointments and selected appointment times
      Parameters:
      customerAppts - the list of appointments with possible conflicts
      Returns:
      false if there is an overlap

    • setBusinessHoursToLocalHours

      public LocalTime setBusinessHoursToLocalHours​(int hr)
      Takes an arbitrary hour and takes an instant of it in Eastern Standard Time and converts it to the local zone hour.
      Parameters:
      hr - the hour
      Returns:
      the hour in local zone time

    • backToMain

      public void backToMain​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the main page
      Parameters:
      event - the cancel or saved button has fired
      Throws:
      IOException - if I/O operation fails

    • showError

      public void showError​(boolean showOrHide, String errorText)
      Shows or the hides the custom error
      Parameters:
      showOrHide - sets the error to be visible or invisible
      errorText - the custom error message to show

    • setSpinners

      public void setSpinners()
      Initiates the start and end time spinners and sets min and max times based on business hours

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates the comboBoxes Initiates time spinners with the hour and minutes based on business hours Disables past dates on the Date Picker widget
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
